javadoc: Interface to define a processor register context over the address space.

methods.javadoc:
@return true if one or more non-flowing context registers fields
 have been defined within the base processor context register.
methods.name: hasNonFlowingContext

return.comment:
true if one or more non-flowing context registers fields
 have been defined within the base processor context register.

methods.name: getFlowValue
methods.comment: Modify register value to eliminate non-flowing bits

return.comment: value suitable for flowing

methods.name: getNonFlowValue
methods.comment: Modify register value to only include non-flowing bits

return.comment: new value or null

methods.name: getRegister
methods.comment: Get a Register object given the name of a register

params.name: name
params.comment: the name of the register.

return.comment: The register with the given name or null if no register has that name.

methods.javadoc:
Get all the register descriptions defined for this program context.
@return array of defined register descriptions
methods.name: getRegisters
methods.comment: Get all the register descriptions defined for this program context.

return.comment: array of defined register descriptions

methods.javadoc:
Returns an array of all registers that at least one value associated with an address.
@return a array of all registers that at least one value associated with an address.
methods.name: getRegistersWithValues
methods.comment: Returns an array of all registers that at least one value associated with an address.

return.comment: a array of all registers that at least one value associated with an address.

methods.name: getValue
methods.comment:
Returns the value assigned to a register at a given address.  This method will return any
 default value assigned to the register at the given address if no explicit value has been set
 at that address.

params.name: register
params.comment: the register for which to get its value.

params.name: address
params.comment: the address at which to get a value.

params.name: signed
params.comment: if true, interprets the fix-bit size register value as a signed value.

return.comment:
a BigInteger object containing the value of the registe at the given address or null
 if no value has been assigned.

methods.name: getRegisterValue
methods.comment: Returns a register value and mask for the given register.

params.name: register
params.comment: the register

params.name: address
params.comment: the address of the value

return.comment: a register value and mask for the given register

methods.name: setRegisterValue
methods.comment: Sets the register context over the given range to the given value.

params.name: start
params.comment: the start address to set values

params.name: end
params.comment: the end address to set values

params.name: value
params.comment: the actual values to store at address

methods.name: getNonDefaultValue
methods.comment: Returns the (non-default)value assigned to a register at a given address.

params.name: register
params.comment: the register for which to get its value.

params.name: address
params.comment: the address at which to get a value.

return.comment:
a RegisterValue object containing the value of the register at the given address or 
 possibly null if no value has been assigned.

methods.name: setValue
methods.comment:
Associates a value with a register over a given address range. Any previous values will be
 overwritten.

params.name: register
params.comment: the register for which to assign a value.

params.name: start
params.comment: the start address.

params.name: end
params.comment: the end address (inclusive).

params.name: value
params.comment: the value to assign.  A value of null will effective clear any existing values.

methods.name: getRegisterValueAddressRanges
methods.comment:
Returns an AddressRangeIterator over all addresses that have an associated value for the given 
 register.  Each range returned will have the same value associated with the register for all 
 addresses in that range.

params.name: register
params.comment: the register for which to get set value ranges.

return.comment: An AddressRangeIterator over all address that have values for the given register.

methods.name: getRegisterValueAddressRanges
methods.comment:
Returns an AddressRangeIterator over all addresses that have an associated value within the
 given range for the given register.  Each range returned will have the same value
 associated with the register for all addresses in that range.

params.name: register
params.comment: the register for which to get set value ranges.

return.comment:
An AddressRangeIterator over all address within the given range that have values
  for the given register.

methods.name: getRegisterValueRangeContaining
methods.comment:
Returns the bounding address-range containing addr and the the same RegisterValue throughout.
 The range returned may be limited by other value changes associated with register's base-register.

return.comment: single register-value address-range containing addr

methods.name: getDefaultRegisterValueAddressRanges
methods.comment:
Returns an AddressRangeIterator over all addresses that have an associated default value for the given 
 register.  Each range returned will have the same default value associated with the register for all 
 addresses in that range.

params.name: register
params.comment: the register for which to get set default value ranges.

return.comment: An AddressRangeIterator over all address that have default values for the given register.

methods.name: getDefaultRegisterValueAddressRanges
methods.comment:
Returns an AddressRangeIterator over all addresses that have an associated default value within the
 given range for the given register.  Each range returned will have the same default value
 associated with the register for all addresses in that range.

params.name: register
params.comment: the register for which to get default value ranges.

return.comment:
An AddressRangeIterator over all address within the given range that have default values
  for the given register.

methods.javadoc:
Gets the registers for this context that are used for processor context states.
@return all processor context registers
methods.name: getProcessorStateRegisters
methods.comment: Gets the registers for this context that are used for processor context states.

return.comment: all processor context registers

methods.name: remove
methods.comment: Remove (unset) the register values for a given address range.

params.name: start
params.comment: starting address.

params.name: end
params.comment: ending adddress.

params.name: register
params.comment: handle to the register to be set.

methods.javadoc: Returns the list of register names
methods.name: getRegisterNames
methods.comment: Returns the list of register names

methods.name: hasValueOverRange
methods.comment: Returns true if the given register has the value over the addressSet

params.name: reg
params.comment: the register whose value is to be tested.

params.name: value
params.comment: the value to test for.

params.name: addrSet
params.comment: the set of addresses to test

return.comment: true if every address in the addrSet has the value.

methods.name: getDefaultValue
methods.comment: Returns the default value of a register at a given address.

params.name: register
params.comment: the register for which to get a default value.

params.name: address
params.comment: the address at which to get a default value.

return.comment:
the default value of the register at the given address or null if no default value
 has been assigned.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the base context register.
@return the base context register.
methods.name: getBaseContextRegister
methods.comment: Returns the base context register.

return.comment: the base context register.

methods.javadoc: @return Get the current default disassembly context to be used when initiating disassmbly
methods.name: getDefaultDisassemblyContext

return.comment: Get the current default disassembly context to be used when initiating disassmbly

methods.javadoc:
Set the initial disassembly context to be used when initiating disassmbly
@param value context register value
methods.name: setDefaultDisassemblyContext
methods.comment: Set the initial disassembly context to be used when initiating disassmbly

params.name: value
params.comment: context register value

methods.name: getDisassemblyContext
methods.comment:
Get the disassembly context for a specified address.  This context is formed
 from the default disassembly context and the context register value stored
 at the specified address.  Those bits specified by the stored context value
 take precedence.

return.comment: disassembly context register value

name: ProgramContext
comment: Interface to define a processor register context over the address space.
